name: Weston

tagline: A World-Class City to Live, Work and Play

challenges.title: Luxury Estate Distribution
challenges.description: Weston's high-end estates in Windmill Ranch and Saddle Club require complex electrical systems, including multiple panels, advanced lighting controls, and significant power capacity.

challenges.title: Strict Uniformity Codes
challenges.description: Weston's reputation for perfection means all electrical work must be exceptionally clean, following strict municipal codes and neighborhood aesthetic requirements.

challenges.title: Intelligent Modernization
challenges.description: Weston residents demand the latest in smart home technology, requiring electricians who are experts in high-performance automation and energy-efficient systems.

faqs.question: What electrical services do you offer in Weston?
faqs.answer: We provide comprehensive electrical services throughout Weston including panel upgrades (100A to 200A), emergency repairs, outlet and switch installation, lighting upgrades, ceiling fan installation, GFCI protection, EV charger installation, generator hookups, and 24/7 emergency service. Our licensed electricians serve all Weston neighborhoods.

faqs.question: Are your electricians licensed to work in Weston?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. All Solomon Electric technicians are Florida State Licensed (License #EC13012419) and fully insured. We pull all required Broward County permits for electrical work in Weston, ensuring your project passes inspection and meets current NEC code requirements.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Weston home needs a panel upgrade?
faqs.answer: Many Weston homes have outdated 100-amp panels that can't handle modern electrical demands. Signs you need an upgrade include: frequently tripping breakers, dimming lights when appliances run, planning to add an EV charger or pool, or if you have a Federal Pacific, Zinsco, or fuse box. We offer free panel inspections throughout Weston.

faqs.question: Do you offer 24/7 emergency electrical service in Weston?
faqs.answer: Yes! We provide round-the-clock emergency electrical service to all Weston neighborhoods. If you're experiencing sparking outlets, burning smells, power outages, or any electrical emergency, call us immediately—we respond quickly to protect your property and family.

faqs.question: Do you provide smart home automation services in Weston?
faqs.answer: Yes, we specialize in high-end smart home integration for Weston residences, including lighting control, smart HVAC, and fully integrated automation ecosystems.

faqs.question: Can you handle complex electrical tasks for Weston estates?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We have extensive experience working on luxury properties in communities like Windmill Ranch Estates, providing 400-amp service, sophisticated lighting, and robust backup power.

seoContent.heading: Premier Weston Electricians – A World-Class Standard
seoContent.body: Weston is a city defined by excellence, from its award-winning landscaping to its top-tier corporate residents. As a community that prides itself on being 'world-class,' your home or business deserves an electrical partner who delivers that same level of quality. Solomon Electric is proud to be that choice for Weston families.

seoContent.heading: Understanding Weston's Electrical Needs
seoContent.body: Weston homes and businesses have unique electrical requirements that demand local expertise. Our electricians understand Broward County building codes, climate considerations, and the specific challenges of South Florida electrical systems. From aging infrastructure in established neighborhoods to modern smart home installations, we provide solutions tailored to Weston's needs.

seoContent.heading: Comprehensive Electrical Services for Your Weston Home
seoContent.body: Whether you're upgrading an older home's electrical system, installing modern energy-efficient lighting, adding an EV charger, or facing an urgent electrical issue, our licensed team delivers professional solutions throughout Weston. We provide transparent upfront pricing, respect your property, and stand behind our work with guarantees that have earned South Florida's trust for over 15 years.

seoContent.heading: Exceeding Expectations for Weston's Electrical Needs
seoContent.body: Whether you're upgrading the smart technology in your Savanna home, requiring emergency repairs near Weston Town Center, or seeking the ultimate in surge protection for your luxury estate, our licensed electricians are ready to assist. We provide clean, professional, and code-compliant work that meets the high standards Weston is known for.
